comment: train_data :: (Mandatory) specify the working directory containing data configuration and output
valid_data (Mandatory) specify the path of the validation data relative to the working directory
hidden_nnet_spec :: (Mandatory) specify the path of hidden network configuration specification relative to working directory
hidden_output_file :: (Mandatory) specify the path of convolution network output file relative to working directory

n_outs :: Specify the number of outputs
finetune_method :: Two method l_rate method are supported  C: Constant learning rate and E : Exponential decay
